channel.title: qubes-templates-community
channel.description: anyone else have to change whonix.jinja to qubes-templates-community-testing ? regualar community templates wont work for the salt even with [qubes-templates-community] enabled in yum for qubes-templates.repo on Qubes 4.1. Its prob just me but thought i would see if anyone else has the same issue. qvm-template-gui shows only testing repos available

item.title: qubes-templates-community
item.dc:creator: Time-Warp
item.description:
This issue has been resolved! No need to use the testing repos in whonix.jinja at this time.

item.title: qubes-templates-community
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Qubes bug.

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

qvm-template - strange interaction with dnf

opened 03:43PM - 08 Feb 22 UTC
unman
T: bug C: templates P: default diagnosed

[How to file a helpful issue](https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/issue-tracking/) ###… Qubes OS release 4.1 clean install and fully updated. ### Brief summary qvm-template has strange and confusing interaction with standard dnf tool in dom0. ### Steps to reproduce These are not steps, but separate use cases: 1. Enable qubes-templates-itl-testing repository in /etc/yum.repos.d/qubes-templates.repo 2. Install template with dnf install. 3. Install template with qvm-template tool. ### Expected behavior The output of qvm-template will be consistent with dnf configuration, and vice versa ### Actual behavior In Case 1: `qvm-template list` only shows available templates from qubes-templates-itl, although that repository is enabled. After #7170, it is possible to view the contents of qubes-templates-itl-testing , but this must be explicitly specified as an option to qvm-template. Case 2: Templates installed with dnf do not appear in the output of `qvm-template`. Case 3: Templates installed with qvm-template do not appear in the output of `dnf list installed`. All of these are unexpected and confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: qubes-templates-community
item.dc:creator: Time-Warp
item.description:
qubes-templates-community repo is broken right now
running “qvm-template --enablerepo=qubes-templates-community list” will show “qubes-templates-itl” in which qubes-whonix-gw-16 or qubes-whonix-ws-16 is not located. Which means “qubesctl state.sls qvm.anon-whonix” is broken due to “/srv/formulas/base/virtual-machines-formula/qvm/whonix.jinja” including “qubes-templates-community” You can change the contents of whonix.jinja file to “qubes-templates-community-testing” which is the same image size if you need to run a new install or want to get whonix working at this time.

Read full topic

anyone else have to change whonix.jinja to qubes-templates-community-testing ? regualar community templates wont work for the salt even with [qubes-templates-community] enabled in yum for qubes-templates.repo on Qubes 4.1. Its prob just me but thought i would see if anyone else has the same issue. qvm-template-gui shows only testing repos available
